pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 16, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, May 16, 2016:

Montréal, Quebec

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Laurent-McCutcheon Award Ceremony.

600 rue de la Gauchetière Ouest
4th floor
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
